mapper.select: SELECT order_act.shop_group_code, order_act.shop_code, order_topping_act.topping_code, COUNT(1) AS amount FROM order_act_record AS order_act LEFT JOIN order_topping_act_record AS order_topping_act ON DATE(order_act.order_gmt_created) = '2024-09-10' AND TIME(order_act.order_gmt_created) >= '00:00:00' AND TIME(order_act.order_gmt_created) < '24:00:00' AND order_act.idempotent_mark = order_topping_act.idempotent_mark GROUP BY order_act.shop_group_code, order_act.shop_code, order_topping_act.topping_code
